summary: An expert fighter leads an assault on the island lab of a madman making a virus for terrorists.
cast: David Bradley|Steve James|Marjoe Gortner|Michele B. Chan|Yehuda Efroni|Calvin Jung|Adrienne Pierce|Evan J. Klisser|Grant Preston|Mike Huff|Alan Swerdlow|Thapelo Mofokeng|Eckard Rabe|Stephen Webber|Kevin Friedlander|George Wong|Ian Duncan|Leonardo Donofri|Andre Jordan|Warren Bregman|Morne van der Schyff|Thomas Witt|Ben Dunn|Ralph Atkinson|Gustav Hoeck|Panico Protopapa|Grace Jergens|Jerry Tsie|Eugene Hammes|John Barrett|Robn Meeks|Mitch Millar|Mike Stone|Ashley Waldorf|Thorsten Wedekind
title: El guerrero americano III
